comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. Cosmas, Damian, their brothers, and their mother:

language.div: Untuk Peringatan Santo Kosmas, Damian, saudara-saudara mereka, dan ibu mereka:

text.language: Tiou n~con n~a~ylovoroc: n~dia~kwn n~te P,#c#: outoubo qen touparyenia~: e~bol qen toumau n~ouwt.
Five struggling brothers, the ministers of Christ, purity to their virginity, from their one mother.

language.div: Lima saudara yang berjuang, pelayan Kristus, pertahankan kemurnian keperawanan mereka, dari ibu mereka.

text.language: خمسة اخوة مجاهدين خدام المسيح أطهارا فى بتوليتهم من أم واحدة.
Ete Kocma nem Deminoc: nem Anyimoc nem Leontioc: nem ouPrabioc hanc/ini ne: ouoh n~covoc qen toupict/m/.
Cosmas and Demian, Anthimus and Leontius, and also Arabius, they were doctors and physicians.

language.div: Kosmas dan Damian, Anthimus dan Leontius, dan juga Arabius, mereka adalah tabib dan dokter.

text.language: الذين هم قزمان ودميان وأنتيموس ولاونديوس وأبرابيوس أطباء وحكماء فى صناعتهم.
Euervaq~ri e~swni niben: na ni'~u,/ nem na nicwma: e~re ]a~gap/ qen toum/]: e~re pou/~i n~ouon niben.
They healed every sickness, of the soul and the body, and love was in their midst, their house was open for all.

language.div: Mereka sembuhkan segala penyakit, jiwa, raga. Kasih memenuhi mereka, rumah mereka terbuka bagi semua orang.

text.language: يعالجون كل الأمراض النفسية والجسدية والمحبة فى وسطهم وكان بيتهم لكل واحد.
Autwounou n~je nit~iou n~con: ausenwou sa pih/gemwn: aui~ri n~hannis] n~s~v/ri: nem hanm/ini hi pimwit.
The five brothers arose, and went to the governor, they performed many wonders, and signs on the way.

language.div: Kelima saudara itu pergi menghadap gubernur, mereka melakukan banyak mujizat dan tanda sepanjang jalan.

text.language: فقام الخمسة اخوة ومضوا الى الوالى وفى الطريق صنعوا عجائب وآيات عظيمة فى الطريق.
}a~gia yeo~doda: toumau n~t~c~marwout e#y#u#: nactajro m~mwou qen pinah]: e~jen v~ran I/#c# P,#c#.
Saint Theodota, their blessed and holy mother, confirmed them in the faith, in the name of Jesus Christ.

language.div: Santa Theodota, ibu mereka yang kudus dan diberkati, kuatkan mereka dalam iman, dalam nama Yesus Kristus.

text.language: والقديسة ثيؤدوتا أمهم المباركة القديسة كانت تثبتهم فى الايمان على اسم يسوع المسيح.
Etauo~hi gar e~ratou: m~pem~yo m~pih/gemwn: au] n~]o~mologia~: qen ounis] m~parr/cia~.
For when they all stood, before the governor, they gave their confession, with great fervor.

language.div: Saat mereka berdiri di hadapan gubernur, mereka menyatakan iman mereka dengan semangat yang menyala.

text.language: ولما وقفوا أمام الوالى جاهروا باعترافهم باعلان عظيم.
Qen nai auervorin n~han,~lom n~atlwm: n~te ]metmarturoc: auersai nem P,#c#: qen t~,wra n~te n/etonq.
With this they wore the unfading crowns, of martyrdom, they celebrated with Christ, in the land of the living.

language.div: Dengan ini mereka kenakan mahkota kemartiran yang takkan layu dan bersukacita bersama Kristus di tanah orang-orang hidup.

text.language: وبهذا توشحوا باكليل الشهادة غير المضمحل وعيدوا مع المسيح فى كورة الأحياء.
